name: Astral Abyss
description:
In this mesmerising game you can discover the long lost secrets of the Dying Shards.
How long will you last against the inevitable danger of the Abyss?

A game made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 50
Theme: Delay the inevitable

Team:

  • Balakchin Victor - code
  • Balakchina Anastasia - art
  • Goryachev Dmitriy - code
  • Mosin Alexander - gamedesign
  • Scherbakov Alexander - art
